doc:
Fernand Charpin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernand_Charpin 0 Fernand Charpin (30 May 1887 – 6 November 1944) was a French actor. He is known for his role as Honoré Panisse in Marcel Pagnol's Marseille trilogy, beginning with Marius in 1931. Fernand_Charpin ( 30_May_1887 – 6_November_1944 ) was a_French_actor . He is_known for his_role as Honoré_Panisse in Marcel_Pagnol 's_Marseille_trilogy , beginning with Marius in 1931 .
